text:
Oleg Andreyevich Anofriyev (sometimes spelled Oleg Anofriev,; 20 July 1930 – 28 March 2018), People's Artist of Russia (PAR), was a Soviet and Russian actor, singer, songwriter, movie director and poet. He was born in Gelendzhik. He graduated from Moscow Art Theatre in 1954.
He was known for his voice role in the 1969 animated movie "The Bremen Town Musicians".
Anofriyev died on 28 March 2018 in Moscow at the age of 87.
